text: Nils Norberg is a heavy metal guitarist from Umeå in northern Sweden. He played in the band Nocturnal Rites from 1996-2008.http://allmusic.com/artist/nocturnal-rites-p293716/biography His playing can be heard on the albums Tales of Mystery and Imagination, The Sacred Talisman, Afterlife, Shadowland, New World Messiah, Grand Illusion, and The 8th Sin. In 2008, he left the band, stating his musical interest had "cooled down".http://www.metalstorm.net/events/news_comments.php?news_id=6717 He is an endorsee of Caparison guitars,http://caparison.jp/caparison- eng/e-artist/e-nilsnorberg.html using 7-string guitars based on the Dellinger model.
